title: ETH2 Operator Onboarding Wave 1: Should the Lido DAO add the four shortlisted staking provider organizations as node operators?
body:
The Lido Node Operator Subgovernance Group has evaluated 13 applications of staking provider organizations and decided to recommend the addition of four of them to the node operator set of Lido's staked ether product.

The four recommended node operators are:
Blockscape, DSRV Labs, Everstake, SkillZ

This vote seeks to gather whether LDO holders support the onboarding of these four operators or not. Our goal with onboarding new node operators is to improve the decentralization of Lido and ETH2 in general and to increase the resilience against correlated slashings, as well as to onboard new organizations with strong skillsets and alignment with Lido to help grow liquid staking on Ethereum and on other networks.

More information can be found on the forum: https://research.lido.fi/t/eth2-new-node-operator-wave-1-recommendations/420
choices: No, I do not support this.
author: 0x1f3813fE7ace2a33585F1438215C7F42832FB7B3
